quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Beijing Beida Jade Bird Universal Sci-Tech Co. Ltd. - H Shs
quote.nm: Beijing Beida Jade Bird Universal Sci-Tech Co. Ltd. - H Shs
quote.summary: Beijing Beida Jade Bird Universal Sci-Tech Co Ltd is a China-based investment holding company principally engaged in tourism development, investment holding of diversified portfolios, sales of metallic products and production of light emitting diode (LED) devices and other businesses including wine and related products. Through its subsidiaries, The Company operates five segments. Tourism Development segment mainly engages in development of travel and leisure business. Investment Holding segment engages in holding of fund, debt and equity investment, including management fee income. Trading of Metallic Products segment engages in sales and purchases of metallic products. Sales and Production of LED Devices segment engages in development, manufacture and sale of high-end ceramic high-power LED devices and modules. All Other segments engages in the production and sales of wine and related products.
